## Installation

You can install the **stable** version on [R CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/)

``` r
install.packages("FoCo2")
```

You can also install the **development** version from [Github](https://github.com/daniGiro/FoReco)

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("danigiro/FoCo2")
```

## Issues and Contributions

If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for improvements, please feel free to report them on [GitHub Issues page](https://github.com/daniGiro/FoCo2/issues). Contributions are also welcome!
